violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provides name 'Марат' but operator does not repeat back and ask for confirmation ('Верно?'). Later, customer provides phone number '903-35-15-39' at 7:51.588-7:54.588 with correction '9-9-9' at 7:57.148-7:58.728, but no explicit echo confirmation requested before proceeding.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Operator announces search with 'Минуту, пожалуйста' at 0:48.737 and returns with 'Спасибо за ожидание' at 1:34.846. Total search duration: 46.1 seconds, exceeding 45-second threshold.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting customer contact information (name, phone, address, email), always repeat the data back to the customer and request explicit confirmation. Use confirmation requests like 'Марат, верно?' or 'Номер 903-35-15-39, правильно?' and wait for customer confirmation ('Да', 'Верно').

Information search at 0:48-1:34 took 46.1 seconds, exceeding the 45-second threshold for complex database lookups. Consider improving search efficiency, preparing more common queries in advance, or checking in more frequently (every 30-40 seconds) to reduce perceived wait time.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected in transcript. Professional tone maintained throughout.

2.1.evidence: Operator provides full service, completes order process, ends call professionally with 'Спасибо за звонок, всего доброго, до свидания.'

3.1.evidence: All customer questions answered: compatibility confirmed, bolts addressed, VESTA fit confirmed, discount explained, warranty and fuel gift details provided. Order successfully placed.

3.3.evidence: No office phone numbers, internal codes, passwords, or personal data disclosed without verification.

3.6.evidence: Operator announces system checks: 'Сейчас проверим информацию' and 'Информацию проверил.' Information provided after verification, not from memory.

4.1.evidence: Customer is polite and engaged throughout. Operator responds professionally to all customer types without frustration indicators.
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only; full tone evaluation would require audio.

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: product codes (R247348, R41066), tire spec (Pirelli Formula Ice 95x55x16), delivery timing, assembly service, warranty (3 weeks), fuel gift (90 days validity, Yandex.Fuel).

6.1.evidence: First search at 0:48-1:34 lasted 46.1 seconds. Customer did NOT hang up; remained on line and received information. No customer-initiated call termination.
6.1.note: Search exceeds flag window but customer waited, so no hangup violation.

7.1.evidence: Greeting includes company name ('74 колеса'), operator name (Евгений Коквара), and offer to help. Closing is professional ('Спасибо за звонок, всего доброго, до свидания'). Question sequence follows logical flow.

7.2.evidence: Customer name 'Марат' at 0:08-0:11 - not repeated back. Phone '903-35-15-39' at 7:51-7:54 - not repeated back. No confirmation requests ('Верно?') observed. See violations_detected for full details.
7.2.note: Critical violation: Echo method required for all contact data.

7.3.evidence: Intro at 0:02.843 (2.843 seconds from start, <5s threshold). Disconnect within 5 seconds of final speech. Both timing requirements met.

7.4.evidence: No interruptions detected where operator cuts off customer mid-sentence without apology. Conversation shows natural turn-taking.

9.1.evidence: Search from 0:48.737 to 1:34.846 = 46.1 seconds, exceeding 45-second threshold. See violations_detected for full details.

9.3.evidence: After search completion at 1:34.846, operator says 'Спасибо за ожидание' (Thank you for waiting). Pattern repeated after second search at 2:18.527.

10.2.evidence: Information provided according to script: product details, compatibility checks, pricing, delivery, warranty, promotions. Logical presentation and proper flow.

10.3.evidence: Customer name 'Марат' used consistently. Professional rapport maintained throughout lengthy 10+ minute call. Operator controls conversation flow effectively. Proper opening and closing.

10.6.evidence: Accurate product information delivered (tire models, compatibility, pricing). Confident command of promotional details (fuel gift terms, warranty duration, discount application).

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name, operator name, and friendly tone
Thorough product knowledge demonstrated throughout call
Consistently used customer name to build rapport
Provided comprehensive information about warranty, fuel gift, and promotional benefits
Handled all customer questions with patience and clarity
Successfully guided customer through order process
Thanked customer for waiting after each information search

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level JSON timestamps used for echo method detection. VTT-level timing used for search duration and 5-second rules. Transcription shows clear dialogue with proper speaker attribution.
